column2: [From.GetName] will be converted to a military command. Doing so may displease some of your dynasty members and vassals.
[FromFrom.GetName] will be converted back to a regular holding.
[FromFrom.GetName] will be converted back to a regular holding. This will make [From.GetBestName] very pleased.
[target_unmake_military.GetName] is converted to a regular holding.
[target_make_military.GetName] is converted to a military command.
Must be a temporary military command.
Must not already be a military command.
The Marquis is responsible for defending a realm's border provinces.
This province has been fortified with trenches and other anachronistic items.

To the [Root.GetComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

My [Root.GetLordLady], I dutifully accept the responsibility of defending [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName]. Those [target_enemy_schmuck.GetInsultAdjective] [target_enemy_schmuck.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] [target_enemy_schmuck.GetInsultNoun] will never overcome the defensives of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
[From.GetTitledFirstName] will start working on improving the defenses in [From.GetHerHis] realm.

To the [Root.GetComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

My [Root.GetLordLady], after many months we have finished the fortifications in [FromFrom.GetName]. We are stronger and more prepared than ever.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
